manifest.install: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_optionalstock`; CREATE TABLE `ims_optionalstock` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment COMMENT '流水ID', `weid` varchar(30) NOT NULL default '' COMMENT '公众号ID', `userid` varchar(30) NOT NULL default '' COMMENT '微信ID', `stkcode` varchar(6) NOT NULL default '' COMMENT '股票代码', `stkname` varchar(12) NOT NULL default '' COMMENT '股票名称', `stkprice` decimal(10,4) NOT NULL default '0.0000' COMMENT '关注时价格', `lastprice` decimal(10,4) NOT NULL default '0.0000' COMMENT '关注日前收盘', `addtime` timestamp NOT NULL default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '关注时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
